text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews A lot of Fox News viewers have been saying the same thing. I look forward to your reply to Dr. Fauci who implied on CNN today that the WH maybe could have acted quicker in dealing with the virus in February....despite him saying this on Feb 29: https://t.co/mUkyqO6Zrp
